mapper.sql: id, commodity, market_price, exchange_price, email_content, amount, residue, issued_time, soldout_time, introduce, online_url
mapper.select:
SELECT gc.id AS id, gc.commodity AS commodity, c.commodity_name AS commodityName, gc.market_price AS marketPrice, gc.exchange_price AS exchangePrice, gc.email_content AS emailContent, gc.amount AS amount, gc.residue AS residue, gc.issued_time AS issuedTime, gc.soldout_time AS soldoutTime, gc.introduce AS introduce, gc.online_url AS onlineUrl FROM gold_commodity gc LEFT JOIN commodity c ON gc.commodity = c.id
1=1
and c.commodity_name like concat(concat('%',#{commodityName}),'%')
GROUP BY gc.id

SELECT FROM gold_commodity gc
1=1
and gc.commodity = #{commodityId }
GROUP BY gc.id limit 1
